user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill the need for comfort and support in my undergarments, ensuring they fit well and provided a smooth look under clothing.
purchase_reason: I was looking for a comfortable and supportive option that would not dig into my skin. The wire-free design and cushioned straps were particularly appealing, as they promised a blend of comfort and functionality. The positive review and my previous experience with similar products influenced my decision to buy more.

I needed a bra that would provide a smooth silhouette under my clothing. The soft, 4-way stretch fabric and lightly lined cups were key features that addressed my need for comfort and support. The high rating and positive feedback from others reinforced my choice.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that prioritize comfort, softness, and durability. I value items that fit well and provide a pleasant wearing experience, whether it's clothing or accessories. Features like moisture-wicking technology, cushioned support, and quality materials are important to me, as they enhance usability and overall satisfaction. Additionally, I appreciate quick delivery and good value for money, as these factors contribute to a positive shopping experience.

Item No.1 : Item Title: <Rosette Women’s Sleeveless Undershirt - Cotton – High Neck, Full shoulder design> / Item ID: B07BTSGMCV / Price: $11.98 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Tops Tees & Blouses', 'Tanks & Camis'] / Description: ['From the cradle to the coffin, underwear comes first!', 'As underwear is hidden beneath clothing, it is easy to believe that it does not require much forethought and that anything will do. But that is untrue, you not only need something that looks nice, but more importantly something that offers ultimate comfort.Your underwear should feel good and not distract from activity your taking part in.', 'GENERAL FEATURES:', 'Made of 100% Extra fine durable, soft Cotton for superior comfort Classic fit, perfect for layering Available in many sizes & colors (Check size chart above) Full shoulder design for a conservative appearance High neckline for a Modest Coverage Machine wash warm. Tumble dry low', 'Comfort + Quality + Style', "The Rosette Sleeveless Tank Top Undershirt is a must-have in any women's closet. The extra soft cotton material allows for all day wear during any type of activity, whether you're at the office or at home.Full shouldered tank straps conceal bra straps for a more put together look. They are very stretchy with a Nice ribbon trim around the neck and arms.", 'Natural Cotton – Eco-Friendly', 'Ideal for women with Sensitive skin and Sensory issues. Item No.2 : Item Title: <Exquisite Form 5100531 Fully Wireless Cotton Back & Posture Support Bra> / Item ID: B000E0V532 / Price: $18.95 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ['Since 1945, we at Exquisite Form have made it our signature mission to design lingerie for you, the real woman who comes in all shapes and sizes. We\'ve understood for a long time that full-figured women "need a fuller bra, not a bigger bra." That\'s why we\'ve designed our FULLY bras to have targeted innovative features, like powernet support frames, extra support undercups, and stretch sides. Available in extended sizes, our FULLY collection features wireless and underwire bras, longlines, posture bras, minimizer bras, bras with lined cups, padded straps and everything in between. Whether you need a fuller fit or more support, you\'ll find a FULLY bra to fit your needs. In every stitch, there is a promise of fit, durability, and quality. A promise we\'ve kept for over 70 years.']
